summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Herbalife e-commerce website. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend mostly working with minor UX issues. All core features (product display, cart, checkout flow, admin panel) are operational.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_bugs.impact: No functional impact, just incorrect status code

ui_bugs.issue: No floating WhatsApp button found, only number in footer
Cart doesn't persist between page loads - shows empty when navigating directly to /cart
Cart icon not clickable on mobile viewport

integration_issues.issue: Some admin navigation items missing proper data-testid attributes

passed_tests: All CRUD operations for products, videos, banners, orders, testimonials
Homepage loading with YouTube video slider
Add to cart functionality with success notifications
Bio-Kinetic design theme with green color palette

high_priority: Add floating WhatsApp button component with +90 542 140 07 55 number
Fix cart state persistence using localStorage or session storage
medium_priority: Add proper data-testid attributes to admin navigation
Update backend CREATE endpoints to return 201 status code
